title: Olive Garden Boosts Darden, Overwhelming IPO Market, The Internet 3.0, Tech’s Political Fail
itunes:title: Olive Garden Boosts Darden, Overwhelming IPO Market, The Internet 3.0, Tech’s Political Fail
description:
Stephen Anderson, Senior Analyst at Maxim Group, and Jennifer Bartashus, Senior Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, talk about Darden earnings getting a lift from Olive Garden restaurants. Jackie Kelley, Americas IPO Leader at Ernst & Young, discusses growth in the initial public markets. Dan Chung, CEO & CIO at Alger, explains what he calls the internet 3.0 and why he is investing in innovation & technology. Joshua Brustein, Bloomberg Businessweek Technology Writer, discusses why Silicon Valley is not good at using tech to impact politics. And we Drive to the Close of the market with Jamie Cox, Managing Partner at Harris Financial.

 Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
